@senatemajldr It also gave millions to corporations & rich friends of urs while the ppl only got 1200$. 
It completely left out #EssentialWorkers who carried economy, higher risk of #COVID19 and left out #HazardPay. They should have gotten higher benefits from that bill. Not rich & wealthy 1%
